wikitext.*:
'''ÑGAW''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "falsify, deform, disguise".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 169</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']] appears the root ÑGAW, signifying "howl".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 377</ref> Apparently this form was changed to [[NGWAW]] (of the same meaning).<ref name=PE19>{{PE|19}}, pp. 106-107</ref>
